SEARCH

Class AiSnakeRunnable

java.lang.Object
AiSnakeRunnable
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class AiSnakeRunnable extends Object implements Runnable
Represents the AI-controlled snake's behavior in the game. Implements Runnable to allow the snake to run in its own thread.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    AiSnakeRunnable(GamePanel gamePanel, int aiId, Semaphore semaphore, Semaphore semaphoreReady)
    Constructs an AiSnakeRunnable with the specified game panel, AI identifier, and semaphores.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    checkAiCollisions(int aiId)
    Checks for collisions between the AI snake and other game elements (field boundaries, player snake, other AI snake).
    void
    checkAiFruit(int aiId)
    Checks if the AI snake has eaten a fruit, and updates its state accordingly.
    void
    run()
    Runs the AI snake's main loop, acquiring the semaphore, making a move, checking for fruit, checking for collisions, and releasing the semaphore.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • AiSnakeRunnable

      public AiSnakeRunnable(GamePanel gamePanel, int aiId, Semaphore semaphore, Semaphore semaphoreReady)
      Constructs an AiSnakeRunnable with the specified game panel, AI identifier, and semaphores.
      Parameters:
      gamePanel - the game panel where the snake operates
      aiId - the identifier for the AI snake (1 or 2)
      semaphore - the semaphore used to control AI snake movement
      semaphoreReady - the semaphore used to signal the AI snake is ready for the next action

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run()
      Runs the AI snake's main loop, acquiring the semaphore, making a move, checking for fruit, checking for collisions, and releasing the semaphore.
      Specified by:
      run in interface Runnable

    • checkAiFruit

      public void checkAiFruit(int aiId)
      Checks if the AI snake has eaten a fruit, and updates its state accordingly.
      Parameters:
      aiId - the identifier for the AI snake (1 or 2)

    • checkAiCollisions

      public void checkAiCollisions(int aiId)
      Checks for collisions between the AI snake and other game elements (field boundaries, player snake, other AI snake).
      Parameters:
      aiId - the identifier for the AI snake (1 or 2)
